Properties summary

AddressSpace
AddressSpace

Gets or sets the AddressSpace that contains an array of IP address ranges that can be used by subnets.
DhcpOptions
DhcpOptions

Gets or sets the dhcpOptions that contains an array of DNS servers available to VMs deployed in the virtual network.
Etag
Etag

Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.
ProvisioningState
ProvisioningState

Gets or sets the provisioning state of the PublicIP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.
ResourceGuid
ResourceGuid

Gets or sets the resourceGuid property of the Virtual Network resource.
Subnets
Subnets

Gets or sets a list of subnets in a Virtual Network.
VirtualNetworkPeerings
VirtualNetworkPeerings

Gets or sets a list of peerings in a Virtual Network.
